publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3252 Mike Pringle: Trams Come Early to Edinburgh—That the Parliament welcomes the arrival of a replica tram in East Princes Street Gardens from 8 to 23 September 2005; further welcomes the chance for the public to have the opportunity to inspect what a modern, accessible tram looks like; notes the benefits which trams will bring as part of an integrated transport system in the city; encourages everyone to visit the exhibition and inspect the tram for themselves, and looks forward to the reintroduction of trams to Scotland’s capital.

S2M-3252 Mike Pringle:Trams Come Early to Edinburgh—That the Parliament welcomes the arrival of a replica tram in East Princes Street Gardens from 8 to 23 September 2005; further welcomes the chance for the public to have the opportunity to inspect what a modern, accessible tram looks like; notes the benefits which trams will bring as part of an integrated transport system in the city; encourages everyone to visit the exhibition and inspect the tram for themselves, and looks forward to the reintroduction of trams to Scotland’s capital.
S2M-3252 Trams Come Early to Edinburgh (lodged on 12 September 2005) Mark Ballard*
S2M-3252 Trams Come Early to Edinburgh (lodged on 12 September 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-3252 Trams Come Early to Edinburgh (lodged on 12 September 2005) Robin Harper*
S2M-3252 Trams Come Early to Edinburgh (lodged on 12 September 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-3252 Trams Come Early to Edinburgh (lodged on 12 September 2005) Chris Ballance*, Eleanor Scott*
